text: Saratoga is an unincorporated community in Simpson County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== A post office called Saratoga was established in 1900, and remained in operation until 1920. The community's name is a transfer from Saratoga, in Upstate New York. A variant name is "Togey". ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Simpson County, Mississippi
title: Saratoga, Mississippi
